definition: one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short/in a nutshell
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: In short, the academic "use" is to be able to defend the country by the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，学术之“用”正在于能经世保国。

sentences.english: In short, due to new formula, it is more and more difficult to upgrade your military rank.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，依照新公式，你愈来愈难升军阶了。

sentences.english: Although this kind of type suffers censure quite, but I think also cannot to sum up in a word.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这种类型颇受非议，但我认为也不能一言以蔽之。

sentences.english: In the end, that is most of goals when we bring simplicity into our lives.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，它正是我们简化生命最重要的目标。

sentences.english: In short, bad news is an investor’s best friend.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，坏消息是投资者最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Computing in the 21st century is all about enabling people to enact change.
sentences.chinese: 世纪的计算技术一言以蔽之“以人为本，变本为举”。

sentences.english: In a word, the legitimation of contemporary intellectual has headed into a crisis.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，当代人文知识分子的合法性出现了危机。

sentences.english: In short, Buddhism is the new opium of the people.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，佛教是西方人生活中，新的麻醉剂。

sentences.english: By respecting our users, everyone wins.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，尊重用户方能实现多赢。

sentences.english: In a word, the president is discovering that Barack Obama is now at war with Barack Obama.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，奥巴马总统发现他正与自己左右互搏。

sentences.english: they are, in other words, made from actual food.
sentences.chinese: 一言以蔽之，它们皆由真正的食物做成。

definition: same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
ultimately/in the final analysis/after all/when all is said and done
(literary) what is?/what is the meaning of?
generally speaking/by and large/for the most part
